mosinstall.name: DOCList
mosinstall.author: Paolo De Nictolis
mosinstall.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL v2 License
mosinstall.description: Creates a list of all DOCMan items in a Mambo installation. You can optionally specify a Category ID as a parameter to display just documents belonging to a single category.

param.name: catid
param.label: Category ID to list docs for
param.description: If specified, just documents belonging to given Category ID are listed.

param.name: showlinks
param.label: Show links to documents
param.description: By default, documents titles are links to document itself. Choose 'Hide' to show a plain list.

param.name: showdesc
param.label: Show description for documents
param.description: By default, documents titles are displayed together with description of document themselves. Choose 'Hide' to hide descriptions.
